title: Surprising & Shocking Cigar Survey Results
itunes:title: Surprising & Shocking Cigar Survey Results
description:
Broadcasting LIVE from the Toscano Cigar Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire… We got the stats on cigars. The brands, the sizes, the trends and the 2020 Cigar Authority survey.  In the first hour we light up the Romeo y Julieta Reserva Real from the care package as we look at the top companies in brands and the top selling SKU’s with the companies themselves.

In the second hour of the show we fire up the Pistoff Kristoff which was a the prime selection for June as we go over the survey results from The Cigar Authority. Some of the answers were surprising to us….

We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum. The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com.

Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
